channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Traffic - Multi-Casualty Incident; INC#1614; 09:46PM; 930 W King Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QUfwy7; Exposition Park; Multi-vehicle collision with a total of 12 patients. Five patients transported in *at least* serious condition. Of the seven remaining patients, two were transported with non-life threatening injuries and five declined LAFD transport. Any questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Inc# 3453. The original 9-1-1 call was received at 8:44PM.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E15 E215 E46 EM1 EM13 EM9 HR3 RA14 RA15 RA34 RA46 RA813 RA814 RA815 RA846 T15; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Traffic; INC#1397; 06:19PM; 18101 W Roscoe Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/40qgAwN; Northridge; Two car collision with auto fire, wires down on all four corners, and a sheared hydrant. There was no one trapped. One patient is being assessed (age/gender/condition unknown). Questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Traffic Division Inc# 2894; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E103 E104 E273 E70 EM15 HR3 RA107 RA73 T73 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Boat or Ship Fire 11/11/2023 INC#1202

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Boat or Ship Fire; INC#1202; 04:16PM; Berth 85 Spd; MAP: https://bit.ly/47lyseM; San Pedro; The first arriving fire companies achieved a quick knockdown with one patient being evaluated for possible smoke inhalation. No further details.; FS 112; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT2 BT3 BT5 E101 E112 E248 E285 E48 RA101 RA112 T48 T85; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart

Boat Fire; INC#1202; 04:08PM; Berth 85 Spd; MAP: https://bit.ly/47lyseM; San Pedro; Approximately 50' sport fishing boat well involved in fire. Initial reports are no occupants on the boat.; FS 112; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT2 BT3 BT5 E101 E112 E248 E285 E48 RA101 RA112 T48 T85; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart

title.a: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire - Forward Progress Stopped 11/11/2023 INC#0787

item.description: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire - Forward Progress Stopped; INC#0787; 12:42PM; Eb 210 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QCQFh2; Sunland; All forward progress stopped and incident will be handled by the LAFD resources onscene. LA County Fire and Verdugo Fire resources canceled. No injuries reported. No further details.; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 BC14 CM40 CM42 E24 E260 E274 E290 E298 E39 E60 E7 E77 E98 EM14 H1 H3 H4 H7 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA7 RA77 RA90 T60 T74 T90 T98 WT88; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#0787; 12:12PM; Eb 210 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QCQFh2; Sunland; One RV well involved in fire, extending into the brush. Approximately 3/4 acre in medium fuel, burning uphill. Firefighters have lines in place to anchor the fire.; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 BC14 CM40 CM42 E24 E260 E274 E290 E298 E39 E60 E7 E77 E98 EM14 H1 H3 H4 H7 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA7 RA77 RA90 T60 T74 T90 T98 WT88; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0031; 02:33AM; 1745 E 14th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3udjCbS; Downtown; The fire load in both pallet yards is mostly consumed. Firefighters have successfully defended three exposed commercial buildings from fire extension. The fire impinged the underside of the 10 Freeway and CalTrans is on scene for freeway inspection. CHP has a full closure of the 10 Freeway with traffic being diverted EB at Alameda and WB at Santa Fe. Follow https://cad.chp.ca.gov/Traffic.aspx for traffic updates. The cross arm of high tension wire is down on 14th St with energized lines, LADWP is on scene to handle. LAFD Heavy Equipment operators are enroute to assist with moving the debris to provide firefighters access to the pockets of fire. Official knockdown is not yet declared but the overhaul operation will last throughout the morning. LAFD PIO Firefighter David Ortiz is on scene for media availability. ; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E12 E14 E17 E2 E201 E202 E203 E209 E21 E210 E211 E215 E220 E221 E233 E235 E25 E260 E29 E3 E35 E4 E9 EA1 EM1 EX1 HE1 HR3 PI4 RA14 RA17 RA3 RS3 SQ21 T1 T10 T11 T15 T2 T20 T21 T3 T33 T35 T60 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0031; 01:46AM; 1745 E 14th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3udjCbS; Downtown; 26 fire companies, including one helicopter, assigned to this incident. The fire is fully involving two separate pallet yards, each approximately 200' x 200' in size. The first pallet yard is under the 10 Freeway which is now closed in both directions. There are multiple commercial buildings exposed but there does not yet appear to be any extension inside. The fire load in the first pallet yard is starting to dwindle and firefighters are holding the 2nd pallet yard fire in check while also defending the exposed buildings. LADWP is assisting with boosting the water pressure in the area to compensate for the high volume needed. CalTrans is enroute to assess any possible damage to the 10 Freeway. Drivers are advised to seek alternate routes and follow CHP https://cad.chp.ca.gov/Traffic.aspx for traffic updates. This will be an extended duration operation lasting through the morning. LAFD PIO Firefighter David Ortiz is enroute for media availability.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E12 E14 E17 E2 E201 E202 E203 E209 E21 E210 E211 E215 E220 E221 E233 E235 E25 E260 E29 E3 E35 E4 E9 EA1 EM1 HE1 HR3 PI4 RA14 RA17 RA3 RS3 SQ21 T1 T10 T11 T15 T2 T20 T21 T3 T33 T35 T60 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0031; 01:09AM; 1745 E 14th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3udjCbS; Downtown; Firefighters have multiple ladder pipe operations underway and large diameter hand lines however, due to the quantity of pallets creating a massive fire load, are not yet making progress. There is a 2nd pallet yard (from Lawrence to Elwood) under the freeway and the fire extended to this 2nd pallet yard. There are additional structures exposed. Two more task forces requested, raising this to a Major Emergency structure fire. There are no injuries reported at this time.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E14 E17 E2 E202 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E220 E3 E4 E9 EA1 EM1 HR3 RA14 RA17 RA3 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T2 T20 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0031; 12:22AM; 1745 E 14th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3udjCbS; Downtown; Approximately 200’ x 200’ pallet yard fully involved in fire with multiple trailers as well. Additional resources enroute ; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E14 E17 E202 E203 E210 E211 E3 E9 EM1 HR3 RA14 RA17 RA3 SQ21 T10 T11 T2 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart
